definitions.text: make fit for, or change to suit a new purpose
examples: Adapt our native cuisine to the available food resources of the new country

definitions.text: provide with something desired or needed
examples: Can you accommodate me with a rental car?

definitions.text: have room for; hold without crowding
examples: The auditorium can't hold more than 500 people
We are lodging three foreign students this semester

definitions.text: provide a service or favor for someone

examples: The scientists had to accommodate the new results with the existing theories
